General.Name: Just Kitchen Holdings Corp
General.Description: Just Kitchen Holdings Corp., a cloud kitchen meal preparation company, operates ghost kitchens in Taiwan and Hong Kong. It specializes in the development and marketing of proprietary and franchised delivery-only food brands. The company combines its operating model with online and mobile application-based food ordering fulfilled by third-party delivery companies. It also operates JustMarket, an e-commerce grocery delivery platform. Just Kitchen Holdings Corp. was incorporated in 2019 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 800 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2V6
